xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/620254-Almost Real: Connecting in a Wired World 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2uwVtkbbzbSeADB2uI1EYvuueo1.jpg This documentary presents a few individuals for whom the Internet has become a way to connect with like-minded souls in surprising ways: a cyber punk based on an anti-aircraft rig in the English Channel who operates a rogue Web server, a monk developing "wireless prayer technology," a "gamer" who re-creates himself in an online game, a retired couple living in an Internet-controlled seniors' complex and a divorc√©e who exchanges vows online with a man she's never met. Almost Real: Connecting in a Wired World
